title: 820-3209 not recognize ssd
message: Suddenly not recognize ssd, very small water damage, pp1v05_s0 is short, but i dont find from were..i was look at all that line but dont see any suspicious things.

title: 820-3209 not recognize ssd
message:
Is not short, if machine works.
PCH power line has very low resistance to ground as normal, on this board.

Check first L4500 and R4520.
Post SSD_RESET_L and SSD_CLKREQ_L; with SSD connected, of course.

title: 820-3209 not recognize ssd
message:
"SSD_CLKREQ_L  3.3V"
Bad value!
Check trace and connection for pin 19/J4501.
Also try another SSD.
Clock request line must be pulled down inside SSD.

title: 820-3209 not recognize ssd
message:
pin 19 trace is o.k 
i was already try another ssd.
R1834 ( SSD_CLKREQ_L) (3v3_s0) look o.k

title: 820-3209 not recognize ssd
message: at disk utility the ssd is recognized

title: 820-3209 not recognize ssd
message:
Then could be an APFS issue.
Take an empty SSD and do fresh install of HS, or Mojave.
